blogPost.excerpt:
Today I Built a COPPER FARM in Minecraft Hardcore, so I could get UNLIMITED COPPER in Minecraft! In a previous episode of hardcore minecraft I built a copper golem statue, and you guys told me to make a Minecraft drowned copper farm! Watch the whole video to find out how to get unlimited copper in minecraft!

Copper Farm Tutorial: ShulkerCraft
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OrqkXmKimQc

★ Watch the series from episode 1:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U7z9MJwIFnY&list=PLXYjxAo4KISJqoE1rkt3OXmM5rCrstpoV

IF YOU ENJOYED THIS VIDEO, CHECK OUT THESE AS WELL:

▸I Built a COPPER GOLEM Statue in Minecraft Hardcore (#54)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vY_G6KsULU4&t=528s

▸I Built a SHULKER FARM in Minecraft Hardcore (#53)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xlGnh-sFkdg&t=12s

previous.excerpt:
🔥SHOP NOW!!🔥━► https://www.teamrar.com/ 

Carter Sharer and Team RAR just did the Highest Rocket Launch Wins $10,000 contest (https://youtu.be/HAJ1cpt9AWk) But today at the new Team RAR house, Lizzy Capri, Deniesse, Matt, Andrew, @Hunter Kowald, and of course Carer Sharer are doing the ultimate Last to Leave Monster Truck competition to win $10,000!! That's right, forget the Monster Jam, if you want to win the real thing, all you have to do is stay on. Each person got 10 minutes to prepare. Liz and Deniesse turned the truck into a girl's lounge, Hunter got his drone, Andrew made a sled and Carder made an RC car chariot!! Did you know remote control cars could do that?? Hunter got hungry and ordered a Papa John's pizza which was somehow delivered using his drone?! In the end, this was a very rare two-person win for a Last to Leave competition. Do you agree with the results??  Comment below!!

❇️ MORE EPIC VLOGS ❇️

@MrBeast Destroying My Friend's Car And Surprising Him With A New One - Slime https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nd-bwvNB7YA
@Unspeakable I Bought A REAL TANK! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rXXPQzfl0ps
@Incredible Facts 10 Most Incredible Monster Trucks In The World https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLMpGcF3kXI
@Lizzy Capri WE TOOK OVER CARTER'S 30 MILLION DOLLAR MANSION!! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xj4jD2wbTaU

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
📷INSTAGRAM → @CarterSharer https://www.instagram.com/cartersharer/
📷INSTAGRAM → @OfficalTeamRAR https://www.instagram.com/officialteamrar/
📷INSTAGRAM → @LizzyCapri https://www.instagram.com/lizzycapri/
📘FACEBOOK → CARTER SHARER OFFICIAL https://goo.gl/WM7mBu

Subscribe to my channel! https://goo.gl/XjjCA8

Business Inquiries: carter@nightmedia.co

WARNING: 
This video is only for entertainment purposes. Do not attempt to recreate any of the acts in this video, as they may be dangerous if not done correctly, and could result in serious injury. If you rely on the information portrayed in this video, you assume the responsibility for the results. Have fun, but always think ahead, and remember that every project you try is at YOUR OWN RISK.
